Es un Survival Co-Op. Pero no lo puedes comparar con esas bazofias como el Left 4 Dead, Esos juegos parecen de Nenas al Lado de este Gran Survival Horror. El GamePlay de 6 en Co-Op lo hace bastante Genial. La variedad de Armas, Personajes y Monstruos, hacen de Killing Floor un juego altamente recomendable. 
(Sangre y Sesos Everywhere).
Buy it!! this game is awesome! a must buy!  Devs release  DLC , map pack, weapon pack! so get your card ready!

This game alsmost define coop survival, beacouse teamplayer is essensial! If you go lonewolf you will never make it to the last wave (11) and if you do, you`re dead.
The enemies in this game are realy creative, and scary if youre into that sort of thing.. But to keep this short its a excelent coop game, worth more than it cost and should be a must have for any coop survival (horror) fans!
Addict Floor :3

This game is probably one of the most stupidly fun games there is in existance. It's rediculously simple to understand: You and a small band of rag-tag, unsung heroes must venture into the heart of a chaotic ghostland, where experiments from a madman's thirst for revenge has ripped apart millions of people, and their cities as well. Defend against ten solid waves filled with creatures who want nothing more than to rip you apart and eat you. If you're alive during all of it, that just turns you into dessert. You have guns, and teamwork at your disposal; they have countless numbers, and enemies that just get even madder if you shoot them. My advice? Buy a bigger gun. The Trader has plenty for you to choose from...
Think Left 4 Dead except you're part of an elite, progressing co-op military squad assigned to take out waves of weaponized, zombie-like mutants!
If you're a necrophiliac, buy this game.
Addicing fun game
I love that game !

Killing Floor 是一款很有特色的殭屍遊戲.

到底是稱為實驗體還是殭屍...就由玩家們自行決定了!

實驗體的多樣化令玩家們驚嘆

從手持電鋸的大漢到地上爬行的實驗體

各有各的特色以及攻擊方式

槍枝種類則依照職業方面來選擇 對應的職業使用對應的武器更能提升效率

人物角色的選取完全依照個人喜好

職業總類方面更是讓玩家們擁有更多喜好玩法的選擇

每種難度以及波數皆不相同

假如房間裡的玩家們團結 可是能讓玩家們感受到同伴的相互扶持

Killing Floor 是很需要團隊的一款合作遊戲呢!

沒有準心瞄準機制讓玩家們真正的考驗槍法

焊門槍的特色也提供許多戰術上的應用

戰術不會單單只是跟隊友殺殭屍而已 還要防範被包圍

而最終波數將會出現boss級對手!

挑戰性非常龐大!! 雖然 Killing Floor 系列已經進行到 2代

不過兩者觀念方面也是有落差的! 還是推薦玩家們能夠來試試看初代!

體會一下當年的風光以及不同的角度來看見 Killing Floor !

----------------------題外話---------------------

Killing Floor 在我心中,實在無法比擬其他FPS殭屍遊戲! 

畢竟他陪伴我過了孤單的幾年, 那時候的電腦並不是那麼的好, 很多遊戲都不能玩

而它的最低配備真的很讓電腦不好的人放心喔!

這也是我第二款STEAM的遊戲呢!   很多回憶都藏在裡面,對我來說真的沒辦法取代

推薦這款

刺激,恐怖,緊張 的FPS

เป็นเกมส์ FPS ที่ยิงฝูงซอมบี้อีกเกมส์ที่สนุก ระบบที่แปลกๆในเกมส์ที่คุณจะไม่ได้เห็นในเกมส์อื่นก็มี จึงเป็นเกมส์ที่คุ้มมากเลยทีเดียว เกมส์นี้ไม่ใช่เกมส์ตะลุยด่านเหมือน L4D แต่พวกซอมบี้จะมาเป็น Wave คลายๆกับเป็นดันเจียน หมด Wave ก็จะมีให้เรานั้นซื้ออาวุธได้ และมีระบบ Slow เมื่อเราได้ Kill อะไรซักอย่างผมไม่แน่ใจ
Это просто ОГОНЬ!!! Left 4 Dead отдыхает))))
rett og slett bare fantastisk zombiespill
If you like playing games that all your friends hate, this game may be for you.

Killing floor is an exemplary example of a “zombie” hunting game done right. Unlike the mundane and mainstream game like Left 4 Dead, Killing floor actually requires teamwork. The persistent leveling system also adds a sense of achievement that is pretty much lacking in Left 4 dead. Killing floor may not be as open or as visceral as Dead Island, but it makes up for that with insane amounts of “zombie” variety. Since this is a PC exclusive, there is quite a bit of modding to be had. Some mods like WPC’s Brute makes the game just a tad bit harder than it was before, while Skynet’s popular mod compilation server makes the modded experience much more accessible to the masses. Overall you can’t go wrong with Killing Floor, its mature community has long been stabilized and the modding scene is seeing progress daily!

After L4D2, I would say this is my second favourite zombie game to play with friends. Lots of different weapons, big and small maps, variety of enemys. Also a lot of servers still, some of them even run mods. 

Everyone should try this game. Its fun.
Каждому, кто играл в Left 4 Dead, не составит труда представить себе Killing Floor. В основе обеих игр лежит одна и та же идея: борьба команды вооруженных людей с напирающими отовсюду зомби.

校正个人技术垄断，重点培养处理意识；
鲜有无意义的枪械，没有无作用的职业；
....难能可贵，贵在FPS游戏设计之理念。

Awesome game. average replayability.
I also like the character add ons.
And the map editor thing is nice.
good amount of weapons.
Overall a good game. Worth the 30 bucks with addons (or 15 if u got the promotion thing i did lol)

In a nutshell, this game is worth every penny. At first impressions, the game seemed mediocre, mainly that the fact it is an expansion of a MOD in a previouse title. 
  The graphics and voice acting would be considered to be inferior in comparison to more modern games of it's genre, but what it lacks in aesthetics and storyline. It more than makes up for it in gameplay. In comparison to L4D2, I found this game to be much more emersive and kept me on the edge of my seat as I massacre through wave after waves of "specimens". Unlike L4D2 its is not rigid in it's gameplay forcing you to be purely team reliant however it allows flexibility in playing style as you have variety of "perks" ranging from demolitionist to a medic (7 different perks in total), thus you are able to run around like a headless chicken carrying a sword. In all, it is a brilliant game that will grow on you and the quirky voice acting has left a real trade mark on this game, I LOVE IT (I killed over 70 hrs playing this)

Killing Floor is bloody, over-the-top zombie killing co-op FPS.

It's zombies are of the horrible biological experiment vein, as opposed to the other, less oft seen voodoo, or black magic vein.  But they are good nontheless, and will babble incoherently as they shamble towards your delicious british meat-body.

Yes, this is a game for people who enjoy, guns, zombies, and using one of those things on the other of those two things. As well as a group of oddly dressed Englishmen shrieking at eachother about money.

It's a grand game, good for many hours of Co-operative mayhem.

And it's cheap to boot!

You should probably buy it.
If you enjoy floors, killing, and Zombies... Well.. There aren't any Zombies, but there are a TON of fucking Floors to get Killed on in this game. I mean... Seriously... Why so many Floors....?

Great game.  If you love survival mode but also the possibility of winning, this is the game for you!  With a great variety of maps to chose, and a never ending change of strategies to survive the waves of zombies.  Many types of zombies make many types of cover worthless or even lifesaving.  One of the best parts is that you can weld doors to keep something between you and the zombies.

I paid $10 for a game on steam when a friend said I should get into it, and because of it I ended up hooked on pc games.
Wave based survival with a good set of difficulites to play as you gain more skill.
6 Classes with different playstyles *Although the time it takes to level up and the requiremnts to level up can be a bit tedious.
The best feeling guns in any game I've played. *You can expect this from any Tripwire game though*
Just look at the hours people have put into it, it's more then just another horde game.
There's still a great community for this game considering it's been out for around 10 years.

Even with The sequel coming out shortly I can still reccomend this game, why not see where it started.
Very fun game.

With clocked in more than 300 hours, it's hard to not recommend this game. If you like level (perk) grinding, and strive for new achivements, this is the game for you. If you like fps with a satistfying guns, this is the game for you. If you like working together with a bunch of headless chickens, this is a game for you. If you want to achive harder difficulties, bring good (pro) friends.
otimo jogo, realista, passar horas com os amigos jogando, RECOMENDADISSIMO

Minha opinião:

O jogo é bem divertido principalmente no começo, depois de um tempo ele dá uma enjoada por falta de modos de jogo, acaba se tornando muito repetitivo.

Modos de jogo:

O game possui dois modos: Modo padrão (Killing Floor) tem um sistema de waves, o tamanho das waves pode ser escolhida pelo jogador, na ultima wave vem um boss chamado Patriarch. Modo de objetivos (Objective Mode) o player deve completar diversos objetivos até chegar no final do mapa que enfrentará o boss (Patriarch).

Inimigos:

Tem uma variedade legal de inimigos que no jogo são chamado de "Zeds", desde os menores até os mais mortais como os Fleshpound

Classes(perks),armas:

O jogo tem uma variedade enorme de armas para cada classe (perk), mas as maiorias das armas são "inúteis" e você acabará não utilizando porque elas são horriveis.
Game possui 7 perks sendo eles: Sharpshooter(Utiliza armas de longo alcance, como, rifles,pistolas,snipers.), Support specialist(Utiliza Shotgun como arma principal, ele é o suporte do time como o nome já diz, podendo soldar as portas com uma velocidade imensa.), Commando(Utiliza rilfes de assaltos como suas armas principais, que não causam muito dano,mas é bom para matar zeds "pequenos"), Berserker(Tem uma grande resistência e utiliza armas corpo a corpo como arma principal.), Medic(é o médico do time, sua arma principal são as SMG que permite curar os aliados.), Demolition(As armas explosivas são o foco dele, podendo acabar com hordas de zeds facilmente.), Firebug(Seu foco é as armas de fogo, literalmente, as granadas desse perk são umas das únicas que são modificadas, quando a granada estourar sairá uma rajada de fogo.).

Comunidade geral:

A comunidade do game é boa, mas como toda comunidade tem alguns players tóxicos que atrapalham a partida e xingam geral.

Jogabilidade e dificuldade:

O máximo de player por partida é 6, cada partida (10 waves) duram em torno de 30 minutos ~ 1 Hora, sendo bem demorada em alguns casos, mas proporciona umas boas horas de jogatina. O jogo possui um "Bullet time" que é ativado aleatoriamente quando você mata algum zed. Os servers são criado pela comunidade como Olimpos,Uack team,Bloody hell,etc. O jogo tem uma dificuldade média/difícil, você pode escolher 5 dificuldades: Beginner(Sem dificuldade alguma.), Normal(Não é nada complicado, qualquer um que esteja jogando pela primeira vez consegue.), Hard(Recomendo treinar um pouco para jogar nessa dificuldade.), Suicidal(Precisa ser experiente para jogar nessa dificuldade, não vai nela logo de cara, vai atrapalhar quem está querendo jogar sério.), Hell On Earth(Você precisa saber jogar muito bem para conseguir sobreviver nessa dificuldade.).

Notal geral:

O jogo é muito bom, se torna um pouco enjoativo por ser repetitivo, mas te trará bons amigos e boas horas de gameplay.

Nota Final:9/10.

A funny game which has its funny moments. It is basically a Survival Shooter. You start a game together with friends, random people or even alone and fight wave after wave against an increasing amount of monsters. The final wave has a boss. Between the waves you have time to buy new weapons, buy ammo or armor.

It already has a successor which means there won't be updates or a big player base, but if you get this game in sale it still might be worth a few hours.

Killing Floor is a cooperative survival FPSRPG horde survival game, in which you and a team of other players are pitted up against a group of mutated science experiements that look like they crawled up out of some B list horror movie. While the enemies lack any real color to them for the most part, they do represent themselves in varying degrees very well in other manors. For instance the scrake being what appears to be a roided up dentist with a chainsaw for an arm, a REALLY bad attitude and a creepy laugh that puts your Uncle Frank to shame. Killing Floor is simple, but bearing this in mind it is also extremely fun with friends, however still manages to keep some form of camaraderie that bands together total strangers in an effort to make it through the " waves " of mutants in order to reach the end boss, the Patriarch. Killing Floor uses a " Perk " system, ( basically classes for the rest of us ) which all specialize in performing various tasks in the group. Things like Medic are obvious however things like the Support Specialist require a bit more finesse in order to perform your job properly. While they are good at crowd control the Support class also has another ability that makes it a cut above in supporting your team. In Killing Floor you have the ability to weld certain " doors " in order to hold the infestation of mutants off for a little bit longer. The Support Specialist is able to do this more efficiently than anyone else. Thus making their role more interesting than most. Your squad gains money by killing off enemy mutants, or assisting each other either in combat by helping to take down a mutant, or by healing each other. This increases the overall feeling of companionship between you and your ragtag team of survivors as it incentivises making sure that you keep an eye on your allies' HP values so you can get some extra profit out of the wave for that nice gun you are saving up for. In between each wave you are allowed to go to a trader in order to purchase new forms of slaughter to dispatch your enemies with. These range from flamethrowers, chainsaws, machineguns, and katanas, to medic guns that shoot healing darts, or shotguns that fire nails. While the game isn't particularly hard in the first three difficulty levels, those being beginner, normal, and hard, the game offers a bit more of a challenge to those among us who enjoy a good ass kicking every once in a while. The difficulties Suicidal and Hell on Earth provide a vast challenge and most parties are doomed to fail if they aren't well organized. This is a refreshing change especially once you've gotten the hang on the game and have some higher level perks. Overall the game will give many hours of entertainment, especially with the ability to extend your search to User Generated Content ( UGC ) which opens up more weapons, maps, skins, and enemy types. Unfortunately this game suffers with a lot of quite honestly pointless DLC that may leave some of you scratching your head asking why? Well you aren't the only one, in fact some of the DLC is downright pointless. A few of them are nothing more than weapon skins or character skins which is fine if you are into that sort of thing. However, there's a few of them that are supposed to unlock new and interesting weapons for you to experiment with and unfortunately, there's only a couple of them worth buying from a statistical standpoint. However, all that aside with Killing Floor 2 around the corner and with how often this game goes on sale, if you're on the fence about picking it up, give it a go.

Pros:

- Lots of replay value 
- Many classes to choose from opening up the spectrum for the type of playstyles it can cator to
- UGC is HEAVILY supported and encouraged
- Plenty of achievements for those of you who are into that sort of thing
- Great game to play with friends
- Mindless fun that doesn't require too much attention
- Higher Difficulties are available for players looking for a kick in the ass
- Easy to make your own custom setup for you and your friends to enjoy custom content together

Cons:

- Quite a bit of " pointless " DLC that seems rushed and pushed just to make a quick buck
- Other than the cliche' tooltips there is no REAL tutorial, so advanced tactics like how to handle certain mutants are left up to either yourself to figure out, or other players to explain to you. This sometimes results in miscommunication amongst groups, even if it ends in hilarity sometimes.
- Hosting a server can be a chore, and sometimes downright impossible for some people due to how the game handles it.
- " Join Session In Progress " feature with steam is hit or miss. Quite often it will fail or refuse to try to connect requiring you to manually type out the IP address to the server to connect.
- Once you reach a certain point with your perks they sort of just grind to a halt because of the INSANE requirements for some of them.


Overall I've enjoyed this game day in and day out. It has been the product of many laughs, much frustration, and a lot of love.
